criterion: Reward for documenting the patient's report of missing a dose of glipizide and the context of the missed dose.
Reward for including the patient's observation of higher blood sugar readings following the missed dose.
Reward for documenting the clinician's advice on using a pill organizer as a strategy to prevent missed doses in the future.

Penalize for failing to document any follow-up plan or recommendation to monitor blood sugar levels more closely after the missed dose.
